page.title: 08SEWAGE FARM
page.content: THERE IS ONE TOWN IN OUR AREA, IT IS CALLED CHIRK,AND THIS SEWAGE FARM DEALS WITH THE SEWAGE FROM CHIRK AND IS 30 YEARS OLD.THE SITE IS ABOUT 5 ACRES .IT USED TO HAVE 2 FULL TIME WORKERS BUT NOW THE 2 MEN WORK VARIOUS SEWAGE FARMS AND COME HERE FOR ONLY 2 HOURS EACH DAY.THE SEWAGE COMES BY UNDERGROUND PIPES.FIRST ALL THE PAPER IS TAKEN OUT AND THE SEWAGE CLEANED A BIT.THEN IT IS PUT INTO A BIG CONCRETE CONTAINER,WHERE IT IS EATEN BY BUGS.THEN THE CLEANED WATER GOES INTO THE RIVER DEE,AND IS EVEN DRUNK BY PEOPLE IN WREXHAM 10 HOURS AFTER LEAVING THE SEWAGE FARM.
